project-notes: MCP Backpack - a persistent key-value memory MCP server. Python 3.14, uses diskcache + FastMCP. Single module at src/mcp_backpack/server.py. Run with `uv run mcp-backpack`. Storage lives in .backpack_memory/ per project. Export/import via backpack.json for git portability.
session:latest_summary: All 7 review items completed: (1) fixed falsy-value bug, (2) fixed toss_out asymmetry, (3) added value search to rummage_backpack, (4) created test suite (20 tests), (5) made storage path robust with project root detection + BACKPACK_DIR env var, (6) removed dead main.py, (7) updated author to PrimerPy. No remaining action items.
